name: Speed-Man Deluxe
description:
It's time for Speed-Man to collect precious gems!

Speed-Man Deluxe is an arcade-style game that requires reflexes and dexterity in order to get higher score count by collecting gems.

The game includes:

  • Five dangerous enemies!
  • Five gems to collect, each more valuable than the last.
  • Three Gamemodes to choose from!
  • Exclusive content to unlock!, etc.

Controls:

  • WASD keys = Move the Player
  • Escape key = Exit the game / Turn back while in the main menu

All rights reserved. Any unauthorized republishing of the software is strictly forbidden.
